text:
Pamela Catherine Gidley (June 11, 1965 – April 16, 2018) was an American actress and model. She was born in Methuen, Massachusetts. Gidley was known for her role as Brigitte Parker in "The Pretender" and as Teri Miller on '. She starred in David Lynch's ' (1992) as Teresa Banks.
Gidley died on April 16, 2018 in Seabrook, New Hampshire at the age of 52.
